ADaM datasets mandatory part New Drug Biologics License Application submitted United States Food Drug Administration (FDA). Analysis derivations implemented accordance "Analysis Data Model Implementation Guide" (CDISC Analysis Data Model Team, 2021, https://www.cdisc.org/standards/foundational/adam). package extension package 'admiral' package.

title: Compute Centiloid Value — compute_centiloid
text: Computes centiloid values based amyloid PET tracer, SUVR value pipeline, reference region. Also allows custom formula parameters.

title: Compute Centiloid Value — compute_centiloid
code: compute_centiloid(   tracer,   pipeline,   ref_region,   suvr,   custom_slope = NULL,   custom_intercept = NULL )

title: Compute Centiloid Value — compute_centiloid
text: tracer Amyloid PET tracer character string expected. custom_slope custom_intercept specified, parameter ignored. See Details section accepted values combination pipeline ref_region. pipeline SUVR pipeline character string expected. custom_slope custom_intercept specified, parameter ignored. See Details section accepted values combination tracer ref_region. ref_region Reference region character string expected. custom_slope custom_intercept specified, parameter ignored. See Details section accepted values combination tracer ref_region. suvr SUVR value numeric value expected. custom_slope Optional slope parameter custom centiloid calculation formula numeric value expected provided. custom_slope specified (along custom_intercept), overrides standard formula parameters tracer, pipeline, ref_region. Default NULL. custom_intercept Optional intercept parameter custom centiloid calculation formula numeric value expected provided. custom_intercept specified (along custom_slope), overrides standard formula parameters tracer, pipeline, ref_region. Default NULL.

title: Compute Centiloid Value — compute_centiloid
text: numeric centiloid value

title: Compute Centiloid Value — compute_centiloid
text: centiloid scale standardized quantitative measure amyloid PET imaging allows comparison different tracers analysis methods. function converts SUVR values centiloid scale based published conversion equations specific tracer, pipeline, reference region combinations. Centiloid calculated : $$Centiloid = slope \times SUVR + intercept$$ slope intercept formula parameters. custom_slope custom_intercept specified, function uses pre-defined slope intercept based user's selections tracer, pipeline, reference region. following combinations tracer, pipeline, reference region, slope, intercept supported: equations used conversions based following references: ¹ Navitsky, et. al., 2018 ² Sims, et. al., 2024 ³ Royse, et. al., 2021 Alternatively, user can override pre-selection specifying custom_slope custom_intercept instead. custom_slope custom_intercept specified, tracer, pipeline ref_region ignored. Please refer Iaccarino, L. et. al., 2025 Centiloid transformation formulas. matching combination tracer, pipeline reference region specified custom_slope custom_intercept specified, warning issued NA_real_ returned.

title: Compute Centiloid Value — compute_centiloid
code: # Using standard parameters compute_centiloid(   tracer = "18F-Florbetapir",   pipeline = "AVID FBP SUVR PIPELINE",   ref_region = "Whole Cerebellum",   suvr = 1.25 ) #> [1] 51.5775  # Using custom parameters compute_centiloid(   tracer = "MyTracer",   pipeline = "MyPipeline",   ref_region = "MyRegion",   suvr = 1.25,   custom_slope = 193,   custom_intercept = -187 ) #> [1] 54.25
